extension_description.message: Automatically save the ads you see on social networks and finally know which advertisers find you the most attractive online.
extension_description.description: The extension's short description that appears on the web store and `chrome://extensions`

whos_popup_sub_headline.message: Click on the chart to see the ads or change channel

whos_popup_first_paragraph.message:
Want to see ads from the feed?
Keep using Facebook like you usually do, we'll do the rest!

whos_popup_second_paragraph.message: (Please hold while we analyze results, when someone is following you, you'll see it immediately, we promise!)

whos_popup_tos_notice.description: Text for the paragraph of EULA and Privacy policy
whos_popup_tos_notice.message:
By using Ads Feed, you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy,

Covering the collection of anonymous user demographics and ad data for market research purposes.

Questions? Contact Us!
